params.name: properties
params.description: Structure of properties to be changed

params.name: region
params.description: CF10+ Indicates the cache region for which to set the properties.

lucee.notes: This function is not supported by Lucee, because they see this as a security risk, as you can modify cache configuration without a password, you can use tag cfadmin instead. Lucee will add support for this function in a future release.
